name: Summer Party
description:
Interesting jigsaw puzzle
There are two ways to play the game:
1.In fragment mode, you drag the right fragment to form a complete image.
2.Huarong Road mode, you need to complete the complete image bit by bit according to the space position.
Game features:
When you do the jigsaw, there will be a percentage progress. When the progress reaches a certain level, the corresponding changes will be made to the pictures you spell, and the more difficult Huarong Road mode will unlock the large pictures into the favorites.
Favorites:
You can see the big picture of Huarong Road mode unlocking, enjoy it.
